scripts.start: concurrently "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-static" "lite-server"
scripts.watch-static: npm run copy-static && chokidar 'src/**/*.html' 'src/**/*.json' 'src/**/*.js' -c 'npm run copy-static'
scripts.build: tsc && npm run sass && npm run copy-static
scripts.copy-static: cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp -r public/* dist
